column4: I am attempting to install cups-pdf from Synaptic ... but its taking forever ... and I am wondering if it is supposed to take this long ... seems to be at the point of "Starting Common Unix Printing System: cupsd" and the hard drive is working non-stop ... what happening?
is updatedb or tracker  running in parallel?
probably tracker .. since I did not turn it off
the install itself should not take long
try checking with the system monitor or top
yeah trackerd is running...
should I End trackerd and tracker-applet?
I tried to end trackerd but it says it is uninteruptible ... wtf?
if you like your hardisk getting indexed for fast search, leave it on or kill it temporary. i switched it off
maybe its running as different user,  e.g. root
ok.. it worked when i did it the 3rd time
and now the install just finished
thanks for your help
start filing bugs for broken things on launchpad.net :-)
done that and its gone nowhere
so 1 out of 3 solved. up to the next one ;-)
ha ... correct
well the mic issue is a no-go ... but the Wireless is still a mystery
madwifi? ndiswrapper?
hmm ... I thought the madwifi driver was the one used in Intrepid!?
dont know. but on the EEE pc is not the same in the kernel and what i installed manually
